name: v1_holidays
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool holidays_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get past, present and future holiday data for any country. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/holidays.
API description: Fetches holidays for a given year and country using the API Ninjas Holidays endpoint.

year.description: Calendar year between 2010 and 2030 (inclusive). Note: not all countries are guaranteed to have data going back to 2010.

country.description: Country name or ISO 3166-2 country code (preferred).

type.description:
Holiday type filter. Possible values are:

- public_holiday
- observance
- national_holiday
- season
- state_holiday
- optional_holiday
- clock_change_daylight_saving_time
- local_holiday
- united_nations_observance
- observance_christian
- bank_holiday
- common_local_holiday
- national_holiday_christian
- christian
- observance_hebrew
- jewish_holiday
- muslim
- hindu_holiday
- restricted_holiday
- official_holiday
- national_holiday_orthodox
- local_observance
